Description of incident: "What Happened?On September 7, 2017, we discovered signs indicating attempts had been made to gain access to one of our web servers. We immediately removed the server from our network and began an investigation with the assistance of aleading computer forensics firm. The investigation determined that an unauthorized individual may have gainedaccess to the server and may have used that access to connect to a database server. What Information Was Involved?The database included information including the username and password combination that you use to access thevendor portal, vendors.tweenbrands.com."
